raw_body: PANDITHAKORALE – RAMYA – 30.04.1937 – 26. 02.2024. Dearly beloved wife of Piyaratne Pandithakorale,​ loving mother of Sunali Kandanearachchi and Sumudhu Chandrasekera,​ loving mother in law of Priyantha Kandanearachchi and Srinath Chandrasekera,​ loving grandmother of Sashya,​ Rashmika,​ Devishka,​ Buvaneshka and Thivanka,​ loving sister of late Major General C.H Fernando,​ late George Fernando,​ late Dudley Fernando and Malkanthi Kurukulasuriya,​ peacefully passed away. Remains will lie at 30/​52 Longdon Place Colombo 7. Cremation on 28th February 2024 at 4 pm at Borella Cemetery (old section).013661
